Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style patterned pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of two lotus flowers in added white outline with traces of added red centres above one probable white band; exterior: wall reserved; in handle zone, two dilute bands above group of four vertical strokes.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1002) (phase 2)
